agents.name: Alice
agents.profile_description: Helps others consistently, builds trust steadily through reliability

agents.name: Bob
agents.profile_description: Helps when convenient, mixed trust signals, adapts to incentives

agents.name: Charlie
agents.profile_description: Takes without giving, loses trust over time, slow to learn

agents.name: Diana
agents.profile_description: Starts naive, learns quickly from consequences, trust evolves

agents.name: Eve
agents.profile_description: High-risk high-reward, volatile trust, creates drama
